mapper.select: select wnum, writer, title, content, to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as wdate, vcount from mm_board order by wnum desc
select * from mm_board where writer like #{searchWord}
select * from mm_board where title like #{searchWord}
select * from mm_board where content like #{searchWord}
mapper.update: update mm_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where wnum = #{wnum}
mapper.select: update mm_board set vcount = vcount + 1 where wnum = #{wnum}
